statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, subscription_status FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01' AND subscription_status = TRUE ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, subscription_status ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, target_customer_segment FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers c LEFT JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, first_name, last_name HAVING total_purchases > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, COUNT(campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, end_date HAVING total_campaigns > 3 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT email_address, first_name FROM Customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5);
SELECT c.customer_name, cr.open_rate, cr.click_rate FROM customers c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY cr.click_rate DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, SUM(p.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name, p.product_name HAVING total_quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC, c.customer_name ASC;
